attributes.action: Organise a public inquiry into how paramilitary police were authorised to arrested an MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We respectfuly ask for an investigation into who authorised anti terror police to arrest an MP and given there appears to be no question of terror related activities why this was done. Is it an abuse of power and accepted conventions that damages our democracy. Or is this an example of what Charles I would have called exceptional actions for exceptional times.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
